statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_tracking WHERE barcode = '12345';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT quantity, price FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_id, barcode FROM inventory_tracking WHERE item_name LIKE 'apple%';
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, barcode, price FROM inventory_tracking WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity >= 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM scanned_items ORDER BY scan_timestamp ASC;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM scanned_items WHERE scan_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT product_name, scanned_items.scan_timestamp FROM inventory JOIN scanned_items ON inventory.barcode = scanned_items.barcode;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM inventory;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_name, barcode FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT item_name FROM InventoryItems WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM InventoryItems ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, barcode, quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM ScannedItems)
SELECT item_name, action_type, log_timestamp FROM InventoryItems JOIN InventoryLogs ON InventoryItems.item_id = InventoryLogs.item_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM products WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, product_name, barcode FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;

SELECT products.product_name, locations.location_name, scanning_records.scanning_time FROM products JOIN scanning_records ON products.product_id = scanning_records.product_id JOIN locations ON scanning_records.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM products WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE address IS NOT NULL;

SELECT scanning_time, product_name, location_name FROM scanning_records JOIN products ON scanning_records.product_id = products.product_id JOIN locations ON scanning_records.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE scanning_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT product_name, barcode, quantity, address FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN locations ON inventory.product_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM BarcodeScanner;
SELECT item_name, barcode, description FROM InventoryItem WHERE barcode = '123456789';
SELECT location_name, address FROM InventoryLocation WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type FROM InventoryTransaction ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, discrepancy_found FROM InventoryAudit WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BarcodeScanner;
SELECT item_name, description FROM InventoryItem WHERE barcode = '12345';
SELECT location_name, address, capacity FROM InventoryLocation ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_date FROM InventoryTransaction WHERE location_id = 2 AND transaction_type = 'IN';
SELECT id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM InventoryAudit WHERE discrepancy_found = TRUE ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
